Package userinterface

Class UserInterface

java.lang.Object
userinterface.UserInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class UserInterface extends Object implements Serializable
The diagram project's UserInterface, Product: "BTC" - A Simple Freehand Drawing Software especially for Kids, Designed for Mouse Use.
Version:
1.01
Author:
zhangtiec (tiegue)

    • rotateShapes

      public void rotateShapes(double cos, double sin)
      Rotate all shapes according to angle of Mouse point to center. If rotate around (0,0), the fomula is: x' = x * cos - y * sin, y' = x * sin + y * cos. in this Cartesian coordinate system, center intersection point of two crosslines is (x0,y0) instead of (0,0), so compute point(x',y') according to point(x0,y0), the formula above need to change a little bit: x'-x0 = (x-x0) * cos - (y-y0) * sin, y'-y0 = (x-x0) * sin + (y-y0) * cos. and then draw all.
      Parameters:
      cos - means cos of rotate angle
      sin - means sin of rotate angle

    • resizeShapes

      public void resizeShapes(double xRate, double yRate)
      resize shapes according to canvas size changing
      Parameters:
      xRate - means the rate of new width/current width of canvas
      yRate - means the rate of new height/current height of canvas Set the every xy positon to xy*Rate and then draw other points need to compute double x2New = this.x2Temp + x - this.x1Temp; double y2New = this.y2Temp + y - this.y1Temp;

    • reDrawAll

      public void reDrawAll()
      draw all shapes including canvas

    • getCurrentShapeIndex

      public int getCurrentShapeIndex(double x, double y)
      get the index of the shape on which the mouse dragging now
      Parameters:
      x - x of mouse
      y - y of mouse
      Returns:
      the index of dragging shape in arraylist shapes if return 99999 means no shape dragging

    • showMouseXY

      public void showMouseXY(double x, double y)
      show Mouse xy in graphics

    • chooseColor

      public void chooseColor(String lineOrFill, double x, double y)
      When Mouse in the chooser color area 800=px+wd>=X>=px=720, each block represents a color

    • loadFromFile

      public void loadFromFile()
      Use the FileInputStream and ObjectInputStream to load the shapes from shapes.BTC. and then call the reDrawAll method to draw all the shapes on screen.

    • saveToFile

      public void saveToFile()
      Use the FileOutputStream and ObjectOutputStream to save the shapes to shapes.BTC. only when arraylist shapes be changed.

    • autoSave

      public void autoSave()
      every 5 minutes call the saveToFile method. the method is learned from gpt, but I rebuild it

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
